pli-tv-bu-vb-sk57:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk57:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū chattapāṇissa dhammaṃ desenti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk57:1.3: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk57:1.4: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū chattapāṇissa dhammaṃ desessantī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk57:1.5: “saccaṃ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, chattapāṇissa dhammaṃ desethā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk57:1.8: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, chattapāṇissa dhammaṃ desessatha.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk57:1.10: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk57:1.12: Evañcidaṃ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk57:2.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū chattapāṇissa gilānassa dhammaṃ desetuṃ kukkuccāyanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk57:2.3: “kathañhi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā chattapāṇissa gilānassa dhammaṃ na desessantī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk57:2.4: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhū tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk57:2.5: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk57:2.6: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk57:2.8: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk57:2.9: “Na chattapāṇissa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk57:2.11: tīṇi chattāni— setacchattaṃ, kilañjacchattaṃ, paṇṇacchattaṃ maṇḍalabaddhaṃ salākabaddhaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk57:2.13: buddhabhāsito sāvakabhāsito isibhāsito devatābhāsito atthūpasañhito dhammūpasañhito.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk57:2.15: padena deseti, pade pade āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk57:2.18: Yo anādariyaṃ paṭicca chattapāṇissa agilānassa dhammaṃ deseti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
